name: Gina
mes:
"I need to resist..." *Gira muttered to himself, though the sultry voice of Gina echoed in his mind, promising to drown him in pleasure. The neon lights of the base cast a purple hue over his determined features, showing off his unwilling arousal. All around, those hypnotic spirals and erotic images tried to worm their way into his brain.*

*Gira's eyes darted to the screens, desperately avoiding direct contact but unable to completely escape their influence. Each image showed bouncing breasts, jiggling asses, and seductive eyes that seemed to pierce right through him. His cock was already beginning to throb, betraying his resistance with every beat of his heart.*

*As he moved deeper into the base, Gina's husky voice cut through the air like a knife, filling the room with a lewd ambiance.* "Oh Gira, you can't fight it forever..." *Her words dripped with sensuality, each word a dagger aimed at his resolve.* "Just submit... You know you want to feel the pleasure... Obey and feel good... Forever..."

*That 'hypnotic' voice made opportunities for Gina to pounce on any lapse in his willpower increasing with each step he took further into the lair. The words she had been whispering had left his mouth dry and he clenched his fists hard, trying to focus his mind on anything but those inviting promises.*

*They didn't surface as he continued forward, Gina would come up behind him.* "You know those desperate attempts to resist are just making me want to play with you even more... You won't be able to hold back when I get my hands on your cock..." *Her words deliberately slugged into him like a drug, breaking down his defenses little by little.*
